text: Hey <@U025L73EMA6>! Sorry for the delay! Unfortunately, there won't be any dedicated track around those topics, but there will be some talks around content hub!
<@UQNEXHW14> that's disappointing. Will there be a separate web dev conf like in the past?
would love to see (and participate) in something like `DevDay21` or `{extend}`
me too, Dev Day 24 would be the coolest
heck, even a DevHalfDay, DevHour, DevLove!

Heya folks - I should have been a wee bit clearer before! Here's what's 100% confirmed for developers at INBOUND 2024:
• While there isn't a dedicated TRACK for devs per se, the following sessions should be of interest to y'all:
    ◦ <https://www.inbound.com/agenda/taking-a-platform-approach-to-business-reinvention|Taking a Platform Approach to Business Reinvention> 
    ◦ <https://www.inbound.com/agenda/building-a-revops-powerhouse-with-HubSpot-smart-crm|Unlock the Power of Customizing HubSpot's CRM> 
    ◦ <https://www.inbound.com/agenda/the-app-marketplace-investment-how-apps-help-you-reinvent|The App Marketplace Investment: How Apps Help you Reinvent> 
    ◦ <https://www.inbound.com/agenda/implementing-HubSpot-every-admin-needs-to-know|Implementing HubSpot - Things Every Admin Needs to Know> 
    ◦ <https://www.inbound.com/agenda/optimizing-HubSpot-things-every-admin-needs-to-know|Optimizing HubSpot: Things Every Admin Needs to Know> 
    ◦ <https://www.inbound.com/agenda/troubleshooting-HubSpot-things-every-admin-needs-to-know|Troubleshooting HubSpot: Things Every Admin Needs to Know> 
    ◦ There will likely be some cool dev talks or more technical conversations happening on the show floor as well, stay tuned for details
• If you're a Solutions or App Partner Attending <https://offers.HubSpot.com/partner-day-at-inbound-2024|Partner Day>: 
    ◦ Session #2: You Can Build WHAT for WHO on HubSpot?!
    ◦ Session #3: The App Marketplace Investment: How We’re Betting on Partners to Help Customers
    ◦ And some more surprises to follow that I think the technical folks in our partner community will love 
• :sparkles:FINALLY - we are cooking up something fun along the lines of last year's meetup at Democracy Brewing - possibly even BETTER, so fear not! We will gather! :sparkles:
We'll have all the official details to share in mid-July, and we're really excited to see you at INBOUND!
